ChessGameKenai   
 

Uses of ChessBoardView in ChessGameKenai
 

Methods in ChessGameKenai that return ChessBoardView
static ChessBoardView Start_Game.getInstance()
           
 

Constructors in ChessGameKenai with parameters of type ChessBoardView
About(ChessBoardView view)
          Overloaded constructor which receives a reference to the ChessBoardView class only to set the location of the dialog in front of the main game.
Board(Chess_Data data, ChessBoardView view)
          The overloaded constructor of the class sets the layout of the board to 8 by 8 adds the squares the board by calling setSquares method It also creates a map that we use to map the images when non visual piece is we use to draw images.
Chat(ChessBoardView view, Chess_Data data)
          Overloaded constructor which receives references to other classes to be able to pass messages between them.
ConnectionBridge(Chess_Data data, ChessBoardView view, boolean isServer, java.net.InetAddress ipAddress, Chat chat, Client client)
          The overloaded constructor of the class creates server or client as well as creates both stream ObjectInputStream and ObjectOutputStream and starts the inner class thread
Emoticons(ChessBoardView view, java.lang.String imgPath, Chat user)
          Overloaded constructor which receives a reference to the chess board view for getting some methods from the class, the image path for setting the smiley gifs on the panel and a reference to the chat class for setting the image on the JTextPane
HelpTopics(ChessBoardView view)
          Empty constructor that creates the graphically objects and has a reference to the ChessBoardView to set the location of the JDialog.
UserManual(ChessBoardView view)
          Overloaded constructor which receives a reference to the ChessBoardView class only to set the location of the dialog in front of the main game.
